author: ajsutton
content: Tracking the eth1 head is the pre-merge deposit processing stuff.  Teku apparently thinks the chain head (which it should have gotten from the EL) is a fair bit higher than EthereumJS now thinks the chain head is - the real question is why the head block seems to have suddenly shrunk by so much.  Not having the latest deposits won't stop attestations - it might stop block production if deposits needed to be included and will affect eth1 voting.
